category.name: Thin Client.Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEWorkflowsToAddAndRemoveStudiesFromBriefcaseExport
preference.preference_description: Defines the workflows to be used in TCM Access to add and remove study objects during a briefcase export of a Collaboration Context (CC). Values must be in the format "AddWorkflow.<workflow_add_name>:RemoveWorkflow.<workflow_remove_name>". The default is "AddWorkflow.Mfg Add Study For Briefcase Export:RemoveWorkflow.Mfg Remove Study From Briefcase Export".

context.name: Teamcenter
context.value: AddWorkflow.Mfg Add Study For Briefcase Export:RemoveWorkflow.Mfg Remove Study From Briefcase Export
